TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BrowserCapabilitiesFactoryBase extends System.Object

Docs.summary: The class is the base class from which is derived. It is used internally at run time by the configuration system to create request-specific instances of the class, publicly accessed through the ASP.NET intrinsic property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks You define browser capabilities in a .browser file. You can use the default hierarchy in the .browser file or create a custom hierarchy to define the browser capabilities.

Docs.param: An object that specifies the capabilities of the browser.
Docs.summary: Used internally at run time to configure custom hierarchies of browser capabilities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks You define browser capabilities in a .browser file. You can use the default hierarchy in the .browser file or create a custom hierarchy to define the browser capabilities. The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.BrowserCapabilitiesFactoryBase.ConfigureCustomCapabilities%2A> method processes a custom hierarchy. The custom hierarchy must contain a `parentID` value in the `browser` element.

Docs.summary: Used internally by the configuration system to determine whether the browser represented by the specified object does not have an available adapter.
Docs.returns: if the represented browser does not have an available adapter; otherwise, .
